de.ovgu.swe_projekt.socialdoc

Class UserData

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.swe_projekt.socialdoc.UserData

  • public class UserData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all user data needed to run the app. All of these variables are saved to the app's preferences and are loaded from there if they exist.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserData()
      Empty constructor.

      Getter for the time (in hours only) the last alarm happened at

      • setLastQuestionWasAnswered

        public void setLastQuestionWasAnswered(boolean answered,
                              java.lang.String answeredAlarm)
        Setter for both _lastWasAnswered and _dateAndTimeOfLastAnsweredAlarm
        Parameters:
        answered - was the last question answered by the user?
        answeredAlarm - contains date and time of last answered alarm in format "dd.mm.yyyy.HH:MM"
